Device_photos.desc: Please take one or more overview shots, and if relevant, additional detailed shots of prominent features. If using a DSLR, enter relevant details below and ensure these are uploaded at days end.

Guide.markdown: Describe the geometry of the feature being recorded. If helpful, record a series of coordinates to accompany this. Note that it is generally not useful to record coordinates at an interval less than the GPS error margin. Temporary coordinates can be collected here and cross-referenced to those taken with a more precise instrument. Use the ‘comments’ field for each geometry point to record point identification numbers, if relevant. Instrument and job details can be noted on the ‘Supplementary’ tab.

Site_boundary_criterion.desc: Select criterion used in recording boundary coordinates

Dominant_vegetation_type.desc: 30m observational unit, uppermost vegetation stratum only

Dominant_vegetation_cover.desc: Vegetation cover, 30 m observational unit, uppermost vegetation stratum only

Additional_environmental_notes.desc: Additional notes about landscape, vegetation, geomorphology of significance and not already captured

Morphology_type.desc: Consider the geomorphological context of the site and select most appropriate response. Use notes below for additional description or if unsure

Morphology_notes.desc: Record any additional notes about site morphology not captured elsewhere

Mound_matrix.desc: Select the option that best describes the matrix of the mound deposit. Use annotation for additional types

Mound_shape.desc: Select the closest mound shape, and use annotations for supplementary detail

Mound_surface_vegetation.desc: Describe mound surface vegetation, particularly if distinct ecosystem is associated with the mound that is different to that of the local dominant vegetation. If so, please take at least one device photo of mound surface vegetation

Stone_artefact_count.desc: Record a tally of stone artefacts observed on the mound surface. Use the certainty slider for estimates on large assemblages

Historical_artefact_count.desc: Record a tally of historic artefacts observed on the mound surface. Use the certainty slider for estimates on large assemblages

In_situ_hearth_count.desc: Record a tally of all in situ hearths observed on the mound surface. Use the certainty slider for estimates on larger assemblages

Heating_element_scatters.desc: Is there evidence of disturbed or remnant hearths as indicated by scatters of heating elements within the feature boundary?

Heating_element_types_observed.desc: Select all heating element types observed

Additional_notes.desc: Describe any other significant features or provide additional details here

Paper_notes_and_sketches.desc: Photograph or otherwise upload any hard copy notes, sketches or plans associated with this feature. Ensure north arrow, approximate scale and a key are included. Use annotation for additional comments.

External_camera_ID.desc: Select other cameras used for photography (if applicable)

External_camera_file_names_and_attachmen.desc: Provide file names and brief captions for images taken with external camera, if applicable.

External_camera_image_attachment.desc: Upload files on server, and annotate those files with captions.

Supplementary.Additional_edits_or_uploads_required: Additional edits or uploads required? If you know that there is missing data such as camera photographs or other issues to be rectified, please indicate.

Editing_notes.desc: Describe in brief editing work required

Comment.desc: Use this field to document any relevant information about the recorded point
